original_text: And it came to pass after this, that David enquired of the Lord, saying, Shall I go up into any of the cities of Judah? And the Lord said unto him, Go up. And David said, Whither shall I go up? And he said, Unto Hebron.
korean_text: 그 후에 다윗이 여호와께 여쭈어 아뢰되 내가 유다 한 성읍으로 올라가리이까 여호와께서 이르시되 올라가라 다윗이 아뢰되 어디로 가리이까 이르시되 헤브론으로 갈지니라

sentences.original_text: And it came to pass after this
that David enquired of the Lord
into any of the cities of Judah?
And the Lord said unto him, Go up.
And David said, Whither shall I go up?
